extendedIngredients.name: chicken
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup fiesta chicken per wrap (<--- Click for recipe)

extendedIngredients.name: bbq sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 tablespoons Mojo Sauce (<--- Click for recipe)

recipes.title: Healthy Crispy Fiesta Chicken Burrito Wraps

winePairing.pairingText: Pinot Noir, Riesling, and Sparkling rosé are great choices for Burrito. Acidic white wines like riesling or low-tannin reds like pinot noir can work well with Mexican dishes. Sparkling rosé is a safe pairing too. You could try David Bruce Russian River Pinot Noir. Reviewers quite like it with a 4 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 30 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: David Bruce Russian River Pinot Noir
productMatches.description: Sour cherries, ripe white cherries, sage and white pepper with a hint of angelica. An earthy mineral and graphite flavor joins the dry raspberry and plum notes, giving this a savory edge.

recipes.instructions: Prepare fiesta chicken; set aside. Next prepare mojo sauce. Lay a large flour tortilla on a plate. Top with  cup fiesta chicken, 1 tablespoon sour cream, 1 tablespoon mojo. Wrap into a tight burrito. and place on plate seam down. Repeat for reminding burritos wraps.Heat a large pan to medium/high heat. Pour 1 teaspoon oil in pan, place wraps seam side down on pan. Crisp for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until golden. Remove from pan and cut in half. Enjoy warm and crispy!

steps.step: Prepare fiesta chicken; set aside. Next prepare mojo sauce. Lay a large flour tortilla on a plate. Top with  cup fiesta chicken, 1 tablespoon sour cream, 1 tablespoon mojo. Wrap into a tight burrito. and place on plate seam down. Repeat for reminding burritos wraps.
Heat a large pan to medium/high heat.
Pour 1 teaspoon oil in pan, place wraps seam side down on pan. Crisp for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until golden.
Remove from pan and cut in half. Enjoy warm and crispy!
